sn11.4:2: ‘Bhayā nu maghavā sakka,dubbalyā no titikkhasi;Suṇanto pharusaṁ vācaṁ,sammukhā vepacittino’ti.
sn11.4:3: ‘Nāhaṁ bhayā na dubbalyā,khamāmi vepacittino;Kathañhi mādiso viññū,bālena paṭisaṁyuje’ti.
sn11.4:4: ‘Bhiyyo bālā pabhijjeyyuṁ,no cassa paṭisedhako;Tasmā bhusena daṇḍena,dhīro bālaṁ nisedhaye’ti.
sn11.4:5: ‘Etadeva ahaṁ maññe,bālassa paṭisedhanaṁ;Paraṁ saṅkupitaṁ ñatvā,yo sato upasammatī’ti.
sn11.4:6: ‘Etadeva titikkhāya,vajjaṁ passāmi vāsava;Yadā naṁ maññati bālo,bhayā myāyaṁ titikkhati;Ajjhāruhati dummedho,gova bhiyyo palāyinan’ti.
sn11.4:7: ‘Kāmaṁ maññatu vā mā vā,bhayā myāyaṁ titikkhati;Sadatthaparamā atthā,khantyā bhiyyo na vijjati.
sn11.4:8: Yo have balavā santo,dubbalassa titikkhati;Tamāhu paramaṁ khantiṁ,niccaṁ khamati dubbalo.
sn11.4:9: Abalaṁ taṁ balaṁ āhu,yassa bālabalaṁ balaṁ;Balassa dhammaguttassa,paṭivattā na vijjati.
sn11.4:10: Tasseva tena pāpiyo,yo kuddhaṁ paṭikujjhati;Kuddhaṁ appaṭikujjhanto,saṅgāmaṁ jeti dujjayaṁ.
sn11.4:11: Ubhinnamatthaṁ carati,attano ca parassa ca;Paraṁ saṅkupitaṁ ñatvā,yo sato upasammati.
sn11.4:12: Ubhinnaṁ tikicchantānaṁ,attano ca parassa ca;Janā maññanti bāloti,ye dhammassa akovidā’ti.
sn11.4:13: So hi nāma, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo sakaṁ puññaphalaṁ upajīvamāno devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ issariyādhipaccaṁ rajjaṁ kārento khantisoraccassa vaṇṇavādī bhavissati. Idha kho taṁ, bhikkhave, sobhetha yaṁ tumhe evaṁ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitā samānā khamā ca bhaveyyātha soratā cā"ti.
